remarks: The quotient of two complex numbers is one iff they are equal. Deduction form of ~ diveqap1 .  Generalization of ~ diveqap1d . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 19-Mar-2020.)
statement:
divcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divclapd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B # 0 ) $.
diveqap1ad $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) = 1 <-> A = B ) ) $.
